inconsistencies: The task requires extraction of file names and their content from the completion, but it does not specify the format or conventions used for file content in the completion, e.g., whether the file content will be followed by a newline or not.

design decisions.file_content_extraction: We will assume that file contents are always enclosed in three backticks (```). If a file name is followed by a newline, that newline will not be part of the extracted file content.

backend/main.py.description: Backend server entry point. Sets up the aiohttp server and the routes.

backend/chat_handler.py.description: Defines the chat_handler function, that handles POST requests to the /chat endpoint and makes the OpenAI API call.

frontend/src/index.js.description: Entry point for the frontend React application.

frontend/src/App.js.description: Main React component that contains the text fields, submit button, filename list, and modal.

frontend/src/CompletionComponent.js.description: React component that displays the completion after the user submits a prompt.

frontend/src/FileListComponent.js.description: React component that displays a list of filenames extracted from the completion.

frontend/src/FileModalComponent.js.description: React component that displays the content of a selected file in a modal window.
